articles.title: A Giant Explosion in Space Will Happen This Year, And You Can See It - ScienceAlert
articles.description: Sometime between now and September, a massive explosion 3,000 light years from Earth will flare up in the night sky, giving amateur astronomers a once-in-a-lifetime chance to witness this space oddity.
